ModMetaData.name: Better Wool Production [1.2]
ModMetaData.author: troopersmith1 - CrunchyDuck
ModMetaData.description:
Shearable animals now yield fleece instead of wool, which needs to be processed into usable wool. Also adds some fleece as a butcher product when butchering shearable animals.
Includes compatibility patches for Medieval Times, VGP, and Vanilla Animals Expanded
This mod uses resources from Slightly More Realistic Wool Production by CrunchyDuck, used under license
